summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates for the installation of vehicle and pedestrian signals, street lighting--signal support facilities and control equipment, landscaping and curb adjustments, all in connection with the Aurora Avenue North Project; and authorizing the Mayor to execute agreements with the Washington State Urban Arterial Board to accept urban arterial trust fund grants and implement the projects; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the arterial development fund therefor.
